headline: Canadians Are Wondering Who Will Foot  Bill for Royals
abstract: Some in Canada worry that the Duke and Duchess of Sussex could be expensive to protect.
lead_paragraph: MONTREAL â€” News from Queen Elizabeth II on Monday that Prince Harry and his wife, Meghan, will be living part-time in Canada was greeted with a mix of enthusiasm and concern that Canada could end up faced with a hefty bill for hosting them.
